cookie.title: Cookies
cookie.message: We use only essential cookies for basic site functions. No tracking, analytics, or ads. You can accept or reject — either way, the site will still work.

payAbout.intro: A payroll bureau for startups, SMEs, and growing organisations — compliant, consistent, and powered by insanONE.
payAbout.whoBody: insanPAY is a managed payroll service built on the insanONE platform. We make enterprise-level accuracy accessible without enterprise-level complexity or cost.
payAbout.executionBody: We deliver fully managed and semi-managed payroll using the same single, governed data model as insanONE. Calculations, controls, and reports follow one clear standard — accurate, explainable, and audit-ready. Clients get compliant payroll and real-time insight without buying or maintaining software.
payAbout.usabilityBody: As you grow, the service grows with you — from insanPAY (outsourced bureau) to insanHRS (fully managed HR & payroll) and, when the time is right, to running insanONE directly. No migrations, no platform change, no disruption — just a shift in who does what.
valuesList: Accuracy — every calculation verified and explainable.
Compliance — embedded controls and complete auditability.
Trust — transparent processes and consistent outcomes.
